remarks: Ring addition operation for the constructed partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvafplus.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvafplus.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafplus.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafplus.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafplus.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvafplus.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` F ) $.
dvafplusg $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .+ = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d E s t $.
$d K f s t $.
$d T f s t $.
$d W f s t $.
